title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Monocacy National Battlefield Historic House Series: Thomas House      Time: 11:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Thomas Farm, 4460 Baker Valley Rd., Frederick, MD 21704 Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Tour the Thomas House, site of the heaviest fighting during the battle.  Check out the battle scars during your tour. View Details      Monocacy National Battlefield National Park Service Centennial Anniversary      Time: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Monocacy National Battlefield Visitor Center, 5201 Urbana Pike, Frederick, MD 21704 Fees: FREE     Thursday, August 25, 2016 The National Park Service was established by Congress on August 25, 1916 to care for one of America's best ideas, the National Park system. View Details      Monocacy National Battlefield Mystery & Myths of Lee's Lost Orders      Time: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Monocacy National Battlefield Visitor Center 5201 Urbana Pike, Frederick, MD 21704 Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 27, 2016 On September 13, 1862, soldiers of the 27th Indiana found an envelope containing a copy of Special Orders 191.  The orders had been written several days earlier at General Robert E. Lee’s headquarters on the Best Farm.  View Details             2016 Schedule of Events  (PDF 50 KB)
